", "new_str": "    def forward(self, rep_anchor: torch.Tensor, rep_positive: torch.Tensor, rep_negative: torch.Tensor):
        # Hyperbolic clustering loss: max(d_c(e, e+) - d_c(e, e-) + margin, 0)
        d_pos = self.manifold.dist(rep_anchor, rep_positive)
        d_neg = self.manifold.dist(rep_anchor, rep_negative)
        loss = torch.clamp(d_pos - d_neg + self.margin, min=0.0)
        return loss.mean()

        loss = torch.clamp(norm_positive - norm_anchor + self.margin, min=0.0)

function.name: str_replace_editor

args.old_str:
def forward(self, rep_anchor: torch.Tensor, rep_positive: torch.Tensor, rep_negative: torch.Tensor):
        pass
args.new_str:
def forward(self, rep_anchor: torch.Tensor, rep_positive: torch.Tensor, rep_negative: torch.Tensor):
        # Hyperbolic centripetal loss: max(||e+||_c - ||e||_c + margin, 0)
        # ||x||_c = d_c(x, 0)
        norm_anchor = self.manifold.dist0(rep_anchor)
        norm_positive = self.manifold.dist0(rep_positive)
        loss = torch.clamp(norm_positive - norm_anchor + self.margin, min=0.0)
        return loss.mean()
